overviews.content:
* Original story based on http://anidb.net/cr41113 [Oomori Fujino]`s light novel series.
Far from the dungeon beneath Orario rises a new threat, one the beautiful goddess http://anidb.net/ch98384 [Artemis] has sworn to destroy with the help of her chosen warrior. But this fighter isn`t the renowned http://anidb.net/ch70850 [Ais Wallenstein] or another storied hero of Orario legend. Instead the fate of Artemis` quest falls upon the shoulders of http://anidb.net/ch70852 [Bell Cranel], who must partner with the goddess and stand against the menace lurking in the remains of a distant, ancient city. Although Bell is the ordained champion of Artemis and a member of the goddess http://anidb.net/ch70851 [Hestia]`s familia, their adventure will test every skill and take every ounce of courage that Bell has — and perhaps, along the way, turn him into the hero he has always aspired to be.
Source: sentai filmworks

anime._text: Dungeon ni Deai o Motomeru no wa Machigatte Iru Darouka: Familia Myth II
Dungeon ni Deai o Motomeru no wa Machigatte Iru Darouka: Familia Myth - Dungeon ni Onsen o Motomeru no wa Machigatte Iru Darouka

recommendation._text: So I am hearing this was a filler/Non-canon story? I mean certainly all the events that transpired here came to a full closure with a promise of a meeting in the oh so distant future (10000 class of distant). For a side story it was well made and it didn`t bore me to oblivion. Could I have done without it? Perhaps! But a Danmachi fan I think this is recommended watch for all of us out there enjoying Bell Cranel`s and Co. adventures.

I really really liked this movie even if it might be non-canon and a filler.

The animation and design is gorgeous. Even better than the tv series and OVA up until now (I`m watching chronologically by release date). The soundtrack is gorgeous. I really have to get it and listen to it again.

The story is great. I like Greek mythology aka tragedy. The ending was unexpected and really made me cry. And I love movies which make me cry. Also it had some funny parts which made me laugh which is appreciated as well. And it was less ecchi than all other series etc. as well.

Very much recommended.

identifier._text: ダンジョンに出会いを求めるのは間違っているだろうか

description._text:
Title: Sword Princess Valkyrie.
Affiliated with Loki Familia.

Title: Little Rookie.
Affiliated with Hestia Familia.

Lili is a Pallum (race) Supporter, she was born to parents belonging to the Soma Familia, so at the moment of birth she was obliged to join. In episode 6 - Lili used a transformation magic ability called Cinder Ella en.

Syr Flova is a mysterious waitress working at the Benevolent Mistress.She is mysterious due that no one in the inn knows where she lives or why she sometimes skips work. She is normally acts kind but likes to tease Bell Carnel to get closer to him.
Syr in the past saved her colleage Lyu. Then on Lyu totally dedicated herself into protecting her and making her happy. Hermes was also oddly aware of the relationship between Lyu and Syr and used it to bait Lyu into joining the rescue expendition requested by Hestia to find Bell.

Lyu was born in an elven village deep inside a forest. However she was disgusted by the attitude of elves towards other races and left the village to reach Ontario a city full of opportunity. In the city she made friends with a female adventure that invited her to join Asteria familia, and also that she would call her Lyon since Lyu was to hard to say.
Lyu reached level 4 and specialised in using wind magic and sword fighting. She has a unique fighting technique that permits her to chant long spells while sword fighting. This style requires an enormous amount of concentration and Makoto even suggested that not even Aiz would be able to replicate such a feat. Her sword is made out of wood of a sacred tree.
Later Lyon solo survived the destruction of Astrea Familia during an ambush by an enemy famila, she asked her familia goddess to leave Ontario for her protection, however this was only an excuse since she didn`t want her goddess to witnessing her revenge.
She took revenge by killing every member of the rival familia and anyone connected with them resulting in the guild offering a bounty on her head.
After her revenge Lyon had no place to go, exhausted and injured was later saved by Syr, which asked her to join her in the staff of the Benevolent Mistress as a waitress. And changed back her name to Lyu.
Lyu sees Syr as her saviour and is totally dedicated in protecting her and helping her in her relationship with Bell.
He is a Level 2 Adventurer/Blacksmith currently affiliated with Hephaestus Familia. He achieved Floor 18. Before his introduction in episode 9 he had made a cameo in episode 2

Asfi is level 3 adventurer member of the Hermes Familia. She has a special skilled called Enigma which enables her to create special magical items. Among the special items that she created are magic slippers that permit her to fly, and hat that makes the wearer invisible. Due her deligence and reliability she is the keystone of her familia.
